description.english: You kept it up to 20 minutes! How you did that?
Lose a heart after taking Black Heart
Can there be anything more lovely than Gemini?
Use the Green gun for the first time
Use the Yellow gun for the first time
No gun in a bullet hell? Not such a good idea...
Use the Rabbit for the first time
Take more of these and you will never die
Now you are the star. All eyes on you!
Use the Turtle magic. How it feels to be so slow?
Who told you that you can do that?!
Restart the game. It is a good idea to start over sometimes.
Shoot a gun for the first time
Aim the gun for the first time
